pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Dissimilarity Modeling // A toolkit with functions to fit, plot, summarize, and apply Generalized Dissimilarity Models. Mokany K, Ware C, Woolley SNC, Ferrier S, Fitzpatrick MC (2022) doi:10.1111/geb.13459 Ferrier S, Manion G, Elith J, Richardson K (2007) doi:10.1111/j.1472-4642.2007.00341.x.
